original_text: When the seventh month came, and the children of Israel were in the towns, the people gathered as one man to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 각자의 성읍에 살았더니 일곱째 달에 이르러 일제히 예루살렘에 모인지라

sentences.original_text: and the children of Israel were in the towns
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 자손이 각 성읍에 거주하고 있었는데

sentences.original_text: the people gathered as one man to Jerusalem
